clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of gout and gouty arthritis

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include nausea vomiting diarrhea epigastric pain ataxia labored respiration convulsions coma Possible symptoms seen after overdosage with other pyrazolone derivatives anemia jaundice and ulceration
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sulfinpyrazone s pharmacologic activity is the potentiation of the urinary excretion of uric acid It is useful for reducing the blood urate levels in patients with chronic tophaceous gout and acute intermittent gout and for promoting the resorption of tophi
